name: Mission to the Moon and Back
name_original: Mission to the Moon and Back
description:
This game was made for Vimjam/8 Bits to Infinity Game Jam

Mission to the Moon and Back is a shoot em up where you collect your captured crewmates, and face hordes of enemies controlled by rouge moon colony. Battle against 3 different enemies and one boss, with help from power ups like the Laser Gun. PLAY NOW... please...

How to play

WASD to move

Aim with mouse

Shoot with left click

Use Powerup with right click

Use 1,2,3 to select different powerups

When you powerup with the Laser Gun you must hold left click to use it.
